name: Advanced Special Topics in Studio
description: This advanced Master Class will be taught by a newly invited instructor each time it is offered to provide students with an opportunity to study with an established or emerging artist from the GTA who is engaged in research that is of significance to current art practice.
prerequisites: 1.5 credits at the C-level in VPS courses
exclusions: VIS401H, VIS402H, VIS403H, VIS404H, VIS410H, FAS450Y, FAS451H, FAS452H
